name: Attuned_Spiders_Bite_F
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Gives most Soldiers of Arachnos damaging powers a 8% chance to deal a minor amount of Toxic damage and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This enhancement can only be slotted by Soldiers of Arachnos and may be slotted into any Arachnos Soldier or Arachnos Widow damage power.
power_display_names: Spider's Bite: Recharge/Global Chance for Toxic DMG (Soldier of Arachnos)
power_short_helps: Increases Attack Rate and Global Chance for Minor DMG(Toxic)
